channel.title: Freelancing on I aM YUVII
channel.description: Recent content in Freelancing on I aM YUVII

item.title: Freelancing or Job?
item.description: Enthusiasm for freelancing is mounting day by day. Due to good income and flexible timing , Indian youth are now charmed towards it. So i am posting this blog only for them. Benefits of Job Static working hours In full time jobs working hours are defined , You have to work 8-9 hours daily. You have to go office at fixed time . Fixed holidays Some companies offers 5 holidays in a month including Sundays.

item.title: Best quality of upwork clients
item.description: Upwork is a largest freelancing marketplace. Upwork offers wide range of jobs starting from $5. You can find clients from different part of the world , Freelancers greeting from different countries. We can say upwork is like a summation with all kind of people. So it is difficult to check the authenticity of people or client. As freelancer you dont know who is behind the clients id . What kinda human is he.
